The size of a dog can vary greatly depending on the breed, but generally they can range from 8-120 pounds.

The size of a dog varies greatly depending on the breed. Smaller breeds such as Chihuahuas, Pomeranians, and Pugs typically weigh between 5 and 10 pounds. Medium-sized breeds such as Beagles, Bulldogs, and Collies typically weigh between 20 and 50 pounds. Large breeds such as German Shepherds, Golden Retrievers, and Rottweilers typically weigh between 50 and 100 pounds. Giant breeds such as Great Danes, Mastiffs, and Saint Bernards typically weigh over 100 pounds.
